identity.sign-in.title: Sign in
identity.sign-in.error.user_not_found_de: Please, check that you've written correctly the email and password that you used to register
identity.sign-up.title: Sign up
identity.sign-up.error.invalid: Please, check that you've written correctly the email and password
identity.forgot-password.title: Password restore
identity.forgot-password.forgot-password: To restore your password, enter the email address you use to sign in to noysi.com
identity.forgot-password.no_account_erro: We can't find an account registered with that address.
identity.forgot-password.success: We've sent you an email to
identity.forgot-password.success_descr: Check your inbox and follow instructions there to create your new password
general.passwd_requeriments: Password must have at least eight characters including a number, a lowercase alphabetical character and an uppercase alphabetical character, you can use special characters as @#$%^&+= and ten or more characters to create an stronger password.
options.minimizeOnClose: Minimize to system tray on close
